name: MELLOWOLLEM
description:
"MELLOWOLLEM" is an ADV game where you explore maps and find objects to progress.

◆Story

Under the blue sky on a summer day, the main character meets a girl.
The story isn't revealed in great detail and is guided by her words.

Where exactly are they and why are they here? Only a hot, dream-like scenery stretches out before them...

◆Game Features

・Advance the story by finding objects.

・Puzzles that are intuitive and not too difficult.

・No quest markers or time limits, allowing for a relaxed gameplay experience.
